mapper.select: SELECT MAIN_SEQ , MAIN_SE , TOP_BN_NM , BOTM_BN_NM , TECH_NM , POFOR_NM , EXPLN , REG_NO , REG_DT , UPD_NO , UPD_DT , STAT FROM TB_MAIN WHERE 1=1 AND MAIN_SEQ = #{mainSeq} AND MAIN_SE = #{mainSe}

SELECT TM.MAIN_SEQ , TM.MAIN_SE , TM.TOP_BN_NM , TM.BOTM_BN_NM , TM.TECH_NM , TM.POFOR_NM , TM.EXPLN , TM.REG_NO , TM.REG_DT , TM.UPD_NO , TM.UPD_DT , TM.STAT , TA.BOARD_SEQ , TA.FILE_NM , TA.FILE_EXT , TA.FILE_SZ , TA.FILE_PATH , TA.STRG_FILE_NM , TA.THUMB_YN FROM TB_MAIN TM LEFT JOIN TB_ATTACH TA ON TM.MAIN_SEQ = TA.BOARD_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND MAIN_SE = #{mainSe}
